CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Application_Question__r.Question_Type__c, "Single"), IF(Checkbox_Answer__c = TRUE, "True", "False"), "")& Checkboxes_Answer__c & TEXT(Date_Answer__c) & Email_Answer__c & Multi_Picklist_Answers__c & Picklist_Answer__c & Short_Text_Answer__c & Radio_Answer__c & IF(!ISBLANK(Date_Day_Answer__c)&&!ISBLANK(Date_Month_Answer__c)&&!ISBLANK(Date_Year_Answer__c),Date_Day_Answer__c+'/'+Date_Month_Answer__c+'/'+Date_Year_Answer__c,"") & IF(Percent_Answer__c!=0, TEXT(Percent_Answer__c*100)+"%", "") & IF(Currency_Answer__c!=0, "Â£"+TEXT(Currency_Answer__c), "")
CustomField.label: Response
